name: Dead Man's Dice
description:
Our submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Set sail on the high seas with your crew of... dice? Yes. Sure.

Roll with advantage by having them work together.
Loot enemy ships. Grow your reputation.
Get new hires, and upgrade your ship.
Rince and repeat until you're King of the seven seas.
Or are buried at the bottom of it.
